thread.title: Grumpy Cat to be immortalised by Madame Tussauds, meh!
thread.title_full: Grumpy Cat to be immortalised by Madame Tussauds, meh!

title: Grumpy Cat to be immortalised by Madame Tussauds, meh!
text:
| Updated: Aug 29, 2015 18:30 IST Grumpy Cat, the Internet celebrity, will be recreated as an animatronic with five different movements, and will first be unveiled at Madame Tussauds' San Francisco location later this year. (Shutterstock Photo) 
If you are a fan of Grumpy cat, the internet sensation who has innumerable memes to her credit, this news might cheer you up (or whatever!) Grumpy Cat has snagged bragging rights to becoming the first cat to be immortalized by Madame Tussauds. 
But she's not impressed (We're sure you are not surprised). 
"This is truly an honor," she said. "I hate it." 
To bring Grumpy Cat to life, the Internet celebrity will be recreated as an animatronic with five different movements, and will first be unveiled at Madame Tussauds' San Francisco location later this year. 
The figure will then tour the remaining five museums across the US. 
Watch here how they took measurements of Grumpy Cat - 
Yes, she is evidently annoyed! Tags
